name: Round King (Physarum)
description:
aim: stay alive control:
    ←→   -   rotate camera
     ↑↓        -   move forward and backwards. optional: collect power-ups to hit balls powerfully Settings (game is in development):
  • enemies at first - how many enemies spawn in the same time with player.
  • spawn new enemy - time between spawning new enemy
Have FUN. Fill small form.
Do not forget writing comments.
